scripts.check_dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); console.log('--- Kontrola složky dist ---'); try { const files = fs.readdirSync(path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist')); console.log('dist obsahuje:', files); const rendererExists = fs.existsSync(path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist/renderer')); console.log('dist/renderer existuje:', rendererExists); if(rendererExists) { const rendererFiles = fs.readdirSync(path.resolve(__dirname, 'dist/renderer')); console.log('dist/renderer obsahuje (prvních 5):', rendererFiles.slice(0, 5)); } } catch(e) { console.error('Chyba při kontrole dist:', e.message); } console.log('--- Konec kontroly ---');"
scripts.build: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && node ./scripts/build-both.js && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && electron-builder --mac --publish=never && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
scripts.build:win: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
scripts.build:win-force: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && ELECTRON_BUILDER_ALLOW_UNRESOLVED_DEPENDENCIES=true electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
scripts.build:win-portable: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish=never && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && electron-builder --linux --publish=never && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
scripts.build:all: npm run build:vite && npm run check_dist && electron-builder --mac --win --linux --publish=never && npm run postbuild:update-version && npm run publish:releases
